mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_faq( qna_num, mem_num, qna_title, qna_type, qna_scr, res_num, question_content, question_file, question_regdate, ask_content, ask_regdate) VALUES ( email_faq.nextval, #{mem_num}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_type}, #{qna_scr}, #{res_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{question_content}, #{question_file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{question_regdate}, #{ask_content}, #{ask_regdate})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM email_faq JOIN member USING (mem_num)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT qna_num, qna_type,
REPLACE(REPLACE(question_title,'<','<'),'>','>') question_title,
FROM email_faq JOIN member USING(mem_num)
ORDER BY question_regdate DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
